project_abstract.cdata: The project aims to help modernize and restructure the Administracion de las Obras Sanitarias del Estado (OSE) aiming at reducing operating costs and increasing productivity, thus enabling the entity to operate without subsidies.  The project also emphasizes the provision of adequate services to low-income groups at affordable prices.  To that end, the project includes (a) institutional development of OSE; (b) rehabilitation of water supply systems; (c) expansion of the Montevideo distribution system; and (d) preparation of OSE's water supply and sanitation plan.
